meanings.definition: A person, animal, or object that is believed to bring good luck and is adopted by a group as a symbol.
meanings.sent1: The school mascot, a lion, always brings us good luck.
meanings.sent2: The team's mascot, a bear, is loved by all the fans.
meanings.sent3: The mascot, a rabbit, hopped around the field spreading luck.
meanings.sent4: The mascot, a four-leaf clover, was our lucky charm.
meanings.sent5: The mascot, a horseshoe, symbolized our good fortune.

meanings.definition: A person, animal, or object used to represent a sports team or organization.
meanings.sent1: The mascot, a tiger, roared with team spirit.
meanings.sent2: The company's mascot, a bee, buzzed around the event.
meanings.sent3: The mascot, a dolphin, dove into the crowd to cheer everyone up.
meanings.sent4: The mascot, a flag, waved proudly at the game.
meanings.sent5: The mascot, a crown, represented the team's royalty.

meanings.definition: To serve as a mascot for a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: She decided to mascot for the team and wore the costume proudly.
meanings.sent2: The dog happily mascots for the shelter, bringing joy to all.
meanings.sent3: He loves to mascot for the band, dancing around in the outfit.
meanings.sent4: The cat will mascot for the library, promoting reading with flair.
meanings.sent5: They will mascot for the charity event, spreading happiness to all.
